document_data.name: Lifedrinker
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lifedrinker''''' was an enchantment that could be applied to melee weapons. When the weapon gave the final blow to an opponent, some of its vitality was transferred to the wielder. This effect disappeared after the wielder rested.
document_data.Notable Lifedrinker Weapons:
* [[Barthus]], a [[vampire]] [[Banite]] [[priest]], wielded a ''+1 lifedrinker [[mace]]''.<ref>
* ''[[Lifedrinker morningstar]]s''
* ''[[Lifedrinker short sword]]s''
